price: na kapag nagpatakal sila sa mga tao ay nagpapalubus-lubos sila,
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسۡتَوۡفُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alladhīna idhā ik'tālū ʿalā al-nāsi yastawfūna
